#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int fun(long int n)
{
int ans=0;
while(n%2==0)
{
n=n/2;
ans=n;
}
for(int i=3;i<=sqrt(n);i=i+2)
{
while(n%i==0)
{
ans=i;
n=n/i;
}
}
if(n>2)
ans=n;
return ans;
}
int main() {
int t;
long int n;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
scanf("%ld",&n);
int ans=fun(n);
ans=n/ans;
printf("%d\n",ans);
}
return 0;
}
